Literature.Title: Conformational analysis and cytotoxic activities of the frog skin host-defense peptide, hymenochirin-1Pa.
Literature.Author: Serra I, Scorciapino MA, Manzo G, Casu M, Rinaldi AC, Attoub S, Mechkarska M, Conlon JM

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:IC50=9.3±0.3 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>400 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus 145/08(MIC=5µM),Staphylococcus aureus V4180(MIC=2.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A(MIC=0.6µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis RP62A/1(MIC=1.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis T6/19(MIC=1.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis T37/8(MIC=1.25µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=10µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25726(MIC=2.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=20µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM8(MIC=5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM35(MIC=5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM75(MIC=2.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM109(MIC=5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NM124(MIC=2.5µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia B32/1(MIC=2.5µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia B32/4(MIC=1.25µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia U8908(MIC=2.5µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia B5/5(MIC=2.5µM),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia B6/2(MIC=1.25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=40µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=2.5±0.3µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(IC50=5.4±0.4µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HT29(IC50=6.3±1.9µM)
